mapper.insert: insert into cart(us_no, prd_no, crt_qty) VALUES (#{us_no},#{prd_no},#{crt_qty})
mapper.select: SELECT pg.pg_name FROM product_Group pg JOIN product p ON pg.pg_no = p.pg_no JOIN cart c ON p.prd_no = c.prd_no where us_no=#{us_no} order by p.prd_no
SELECT p.pg_name from product_group p, cart c where p.pg_no = c.p
mapper.update: update cart set crt_qty = #{crt_qty} where us_no = #{us_no} and prd_no = #{prd_no}
mapper.select: select p.prd_name, p.prd_price, p.prd_ship_fee, c.us_no, c.prd_no, c.crt_qty from product p, cart c where p.prd_no = c.prd_no and us_no=#{us_no} order by p.prd_no

SELECT img_file, img_type, prd_no FROM ( SELECT i.img_file, i.img_type, c.prd_no, i.img_use, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.prd_no ORDER BY c.prd_no) AS rn FROM image i INNER JOIN cart c ON i.prd_no = c.prd_no where img_use = 'THM' ) WHERE rn = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product p, cart c WHERE p.prd_no = c.prd_no AND us_no = #{us_no}

SELECT prd_name, prd_price, prd_ship_fee, us_no, prd_no, crt_qty FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, p.prd_name, p.prd_price, p.prd_ship_fee, c.us_no, c.prd_no, c.crt_qty FROM product p, cart c WHERE p.prd_no = c.prd_no AND us_no = #{us_no}
AND ROWNUM <= #{endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO cart USING dual ON ( us_no = #{us_no} AND prd_no = #{prd_no} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET crt_qty = 1 + crt_qty WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( us_no, prd_no, crt_qty ) VALUES ( #{us_no}, #{prd_no}, 1 )
